languages.text: {n}Изможденный человек, поднимает на вас воспаленные глаза. На секунду смолкают все звуки, не слышно даже скрипа перьев бесчисленных сервочерепов. Взгляд священнослужителя исполнен настолько сильной, незамутненной болью, что у вас перехватывает дыхание.{/n} "Я грешен, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора. Меня обуревают грешные мысли, но никто не верит, когда я об этом говорю. Сокровища, что я имею, я раздаю, но люди несут мне все новые. Но тяжелее всего то, что я заставляю людей ошибаться. Глядя на меня, они считают, что можно стать безгрешным, а я... я очень устал..."
languages.translation_comment:
Кадр на правую сторону весов.
После куя помощник кладет на чашу меч.

Кадр на правую сторону весов.
После куя помощник кладет на чашу меч.

languages.text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The man's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes in your throat.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Worse still is the knowledge that I am leading people astray. They look at me and believe a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."
languages.original_text: {n}Изможденный человек, поднимает на вас воспаленные глаза. На секунду смолкают все звуки, не слышно даже скрипа перьев бесчисленных сервочерепов. Взгляд священнослужителя исполнен настолько сильной, незамутненной болью, что у вас перехватывает дыхание.{/n} "Я грешен, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора. Меня обуревают грешные мысли, но никто не верит, когда я об этом говорю. Сокровища, что я имею, я раздаю, но люди несут мне все новые. Но тяжелее всего то, что я заставляю людей ошибаться. Глядя на меня, они считают, что можно стать безгрешным, а я... я очень устал..."

traits.locale_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a second, all sounds cease, even the creaking of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The cleric's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes me when I speak about it. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. But worst of all is knowing that I lead people astray. They look at me and think a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

But worst of all is knowing that I lead people astray. They look at me and think a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

languages.text: {n}Ein hagerer Mann richtet seine blutunterlaufenen Augen auf dich. Für einen kurzen Moment verstummen alle Geräusche ... selbst das Kratzen der Federn der zahllosen Servoschädel. Der Schmerz im Gesicht des Mannes ist so stark und unverfälscht, dass dir der Atem stockt.{/n} "Ich bin unrein, {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Imperators! Ich bin von unreinen Gedanken beseelt, aber niemand glaubt mir meine Bekenntnisse. Ich trennte mich von all meinen Schätzen, doch die Leute bringen mir nur noch mehr. Aber noch schlimmer ist das Wissen, dass ich Leute vom rechten Weg abbringe. Sie sehen mich an und glauben, ein Zustand perfekter Anmut wäre erreichbar, während ich ... Ich bin so müde ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Ich bin von unreinen Gedanken beseelt, aber niemand glaubt mir meine Bekenntnisse. Ich trennte mich von all meinen Schätzen, doch die Leute bringen mir nur noch mehr. Aber noch schlimmer ist das Wissen, dass ich Leute vom rechten Weg abbringe. Sie sehen mich an und glauben, ein Zustand perfekter Anmut wäre erreichbar, während ich ... Ich bin so müde ..."

languages.text: {n}Un homme aux traits tirés lève ses yeux injectés de sang vers vous. Pendant un instant, tous les bruits cessent dans la salle, même le grattement des innombrables plumes des servocrânes. Le regard de l'homme est empreint d'une douleur si intense et si limpide que votre gorge se serre.{/n} « Je suis impur, ô {mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. Des pensées malsaines m'assaillent sans relâche, mais personne ne croit mes confessions. Bien que je ne cesse de faire don des trésors en ma possession, on m'en apporte toujours plus. Pire encore, je sais que je détourne les gens du droit chemin. Quand ils me regardent, ils pensent qu'il est possible d'atteindre un état de grâce parfaite, alors que je... je suis très fatigué... »
languages.original_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The man's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes in your throat.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Worse still is the knowledge that I am leading people astray. They look at me and believe a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

Le regard de l'homme est empreint d'une douleur si intense et si limpide que votre gorge se serre.{/n} « Je suis impur, ô {mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. Des pensées malsaines m'assaillent sans relâche, mais personne ne croit mes confessions. Bien que je ne cesse de faire don des trésors en ma possession, on m'en apporte toujours plus. Pire encore, je sais que je détourne les gens du droit chemin. Quand ils me regardent, ils pensent qu'il est possible d'atteindre un état de grâce parfaite, alors que je... je suis très fatigué... »

languages.text: {n}一个满面憔悴的男人抬起布满血丝的眼睛看着你。一时间，所有声音都停止了，甚至连无数伺服头骨上羽毛笔的刮擦声也停了下来。这个男人的目光中满是痛苦，他的痛苦是如此强烈、如此纯粹，你甚至感觉自己的呼吸都被扼住了。{/n}“噢，帝皇的神选者啊，我是不洁之人。我受不洁的思想困扰，但没人肯相信我的忏悔。一直以来，我在不断布施，但这仅仅是为了让人们给我带来更多财富。更糟糕的是，我把人们引入歧途。那些人看着我，坚信自己也能成为信仰的典范，可我……我真的心力交瘁了……”
languages.original_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The man's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes in your throat.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Worse still is the knowledge that I am leading people astray. They look at me and believe a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

languages.text: {n}Un hombre de aspecto demacrado te mira con ojos inyectados en sangre. Por un momento, el silencio se apodera incluso de las plumas de los servocráneos. El dolor de la mirada del hombre es tan intenso que se te forma un nudo en la garganta.{/n} «Soy impuro, oh, ungif{mf|o|a} del Emperador. Me acosan pensamientos impuros, pero nadie cree mis confesiones. He intentado repartir mis pertenencias, pero la gente me trae más. Y, peor aún, la gente está descarriando por mi culpa. Al verme, creen que es posible obtener una gracia perfecta, pero yo... solo quiero descansar...».
languages.original_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The man's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes in your throat.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Worse still is the knowledge that I am leading people astray. They look at me and believe a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre de aspecto demacrado te mira con ojos inyectados en sangre. Por un momento, el silencio se apodera incluso de las plumas de los servocráneos. El dolor de la mirada del hombre es tan intenso que se te forma un nudo en la garganta.{/n} «Soy impuro, oh, ungif{mf|o|a} del Emperador. Me acosan pensamientos impuros, pero nadie cree mis confesiones. He intentado repartir mis pertenencias, pero la gente me trae más. Y, peor aún, la gente está descarriando por mi culpa. Al verme, creen que es posible obtener una gracia perfecta, pero yo... solo quiero descansar...».

languages.text: {n}やせ細った男が血走った目をあなたを見上げる。一瞬、すべての音が止む。無数のサーヴォスカルの羽ペンの引っかき音さえも。その男の視線は、息が詰まるほどの強い痛みに満ちており、あなたの息が喉に詰まる。{/n}「あぁ、神帝陛下に聖別された方よ、私は不純です。不純な思いにさいなまれていますが、誰も私の告白を信じてくれません。私が持っている財宝を手放しては、人々が私にもっと恵んでくれるだけです。さらに悪いことに、私は人々を迷わせています。彼らは私を見て、完璧な恵みの状態に到達できると信じています。私はとても疲れています…」
languages.original_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The man's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes in your throat.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Worse still is the knowledge that I am leading people astray. They look at me and believe a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

languages.text: {n}Bir deri bir kemik kalmış bir adam, kan çanağı gözlerini kaldırıp sana çeviriyor. Bir anlığına ortama sessizlik çöküyor. Sayısız hizmeletin tüy kaleminden çıkan çiziktirme sesi bile kesiliyor. Adamın saf bir acıyla dolu olan güçlü bakışları altında nefesin boğazında düğümleniyor.{/n} "Ey İmparator'un kutsanmışı, ben saf değilim. İffetsiz düşüncelerle kuşatıldım lakin kimse itiraflarıma itibar etmiyor. Sahip olduğum hazineleri dağıtıyorum ancak insanlar bana daha fazla zenginlik bahşediyor. Daha da kötüsü, insanları yoldan çıkardığımın farkındayım. Bana bakıp mutlak lütuf hâline ulaşabileceklerine inanıyorlar. Oysa ben sadece... Çok yorgunum..."
languages.original_text: {n}A gaunt man raises his bloodshot eyes at you. For a moment, all sounds cease, even the scratching of the countless servo-skulls' quills. The man's gaze is full of a pain so strong and undiluted that your breath seizes in your throat.{/n} "I am impure, O Emperor's anointed one. I am beset by impure thoughts, but no one believes my confessions. I have been giving away the treasures I possess, only for people to bring me more. Worse still is the knowledge that I am leading people astray. They look at me and believe a state of perfect grace is attainable, while I... I am very tired..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir deri bir kemik kalmış bir adam kan çanağı gözlerini kaldırıp sana çeviriyor. Bir anlığına bir sessizlik çöküyor. Sayısız hizmelet tüy kaleminden çıkan çiziktirme sesi bile kesiliyor. Adamın saf bir acıyla dolu olan güçlü bakışları altında nefesin boğazında düğümleniyor.{/n} "Ben saf değilim, ey İmparator'un kutsanmışı. İffetsiz düşüncelerle kuşatıldım lakin kimse itiraflarıma itibar etmiyor. Sahip olduğum hazineleri dağıtıyorum ancak insanlar bana daha fazla zenginlik bahşediyor. Daha da kötüsü, insanları yoldan çıkardığımın farkındayım. Bana bakıp mutlak lütuf hâlinin erişilebilir olduğuna inanıyorlar. Oysaki ben sadece... Çok yorgunum..."
